amendment.description: To withhold funds for foerign assistance for nations that refuse to pay diplomatic parking tickets.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1988 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1988 proposed by Senator Leahy for Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S13344-13345; text: CR S13344-13345) To withhold funds for foerign assistance for nations that refuse to pay diplomatic parking tickets.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1988 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1988 proposed by Senator Leahy for Senator Schumer.
